title: Spherical Transformer for LiDAR-based 3D Recognition. (arXiv:2303.12766v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: LiDAR-based 3D point cloud recognition has benefited various applications. Without specially considering the LiDAR point distribution, most current methods suffer from information disconnection and limited receptive field, especially for the sparse distant points. In this work, we study the varying-sparsity distribution of LiDAR points and present SphereFormer to directly aggregate information from dense close points to the sparse distant ones. We design radial window self-attention that partitions the space into multiple non-overlapping narrow and long windows. It overcomes the disconnection issue and enlarges the receptive field smoothly and dramatically, which significantly boosts the performance of sparse distant points. Moreover, to fit the narrow and long windows, we propose exponential splitting to yield fine-grained position encoding and dynamic feature selection to increase model representation ability. Notably, our method ranks 1st on both nuScenes and SemanticKITTI semantic

translated_title: 基于球面变换的LiDAR三维识别技术
translated_abstract: 基于LiDAR点云的三维识别已经在各种应用中得到了广泛的应用。当前大多数方法并没有专门考虑LiDAR点分布的情况，因此对于稀疏的远距离点经常面临信息不连通和有限感受野的问题。本文研究了LiDAR点分布的不同稀疏性，并提出了SphereFormer，可直接从密集的近距离点聚合信息和稀疏的远距离点。我们设计了径向窗口自注意力机制，将空间划分为多个非重叠窄长窗口。它可以克服不连通问题，平滑且显着地扩大感受野，从而显著提高稀疏远距离点的性能。此外，为了适应窄长窗口，我们提出指数分裂方法以得到细粒度的位置编码和动态特征选择以提高模型表征能力。值得注意的是，我们的方法在nuScenes和SemanticKITTI语义分割数据集上均名列前茅。
tldr: 本文提出了一种名为SphereFormer的新方法，它考虑了LiDAR点云数据的不同稀疏度，通过设计径向窗口自注意力机制和指数分裂等手段，可以聚合和处理稀疏的远距离点，具有更好的性能表现。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new method called SphereFormer, which considers the varying-sparsity distribution of LiDAR point cloud data and can handle sparse distant points through radial window self-attention and exponential splitting. It achieves better performance on semantic segmentation tasks, ranking 1st on both nuScenes and SemanticKITTI datasets.
